test_plan.title: User Authentication - Google OAuth
test_plan.description: Test Google OAuth authentication flow for users
steps: Verify successful login and redirect to appropriate dashboard
test_plan.expected_result: User should be able to authenticate using Google OAuth and be redirected to the appropriate dashboard based on their role

test_plan.title: Hotel Search and Discovery
test_plan.description: Test hotel search functionality with rural context
steps: Apply filters for price, amenities, and availability
Verify search results show local accommodations
Test offline search with cached data
test_plan.expected_result: Users should be able to search for hotels in rural areas with appropriate filters and offline support

test_plan.title: PWA Installation and Offline Support
test_plan.description: Test Progressive Web App installation and offline functionality
steps: Open the application in a supported browser
Install the PWA to home screen
Verify service worker caching works properly
test_plan.expected_result: PWA should install successfully and provide offline functionality

test_plan.title: Hotel Admin Dashboard
steps: Test room management (add, edit, delete rooms)
Verify offline mode for basic management functions
test_plan.expected_result: Hotel admins should have full access to management features with offline support

test_plan.title: Responsive Design and Mobile Experience
test_plan.description: Test responsive design and mobile user experience
steps: Test application on different screen sizes
Test touch interactions and large touch targets
Verify simplified interface for rural users
test_plan.expected_result: Application should be fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices
